title: Ch
anchor: Showing: “CH” might mean Champion depending on your system

title: Colours line
definition: Colours are described in this order: cap

title: Course orientation
definition: If you tell me a landmark I can help you orient gently.

title: Official Rating
definition: The official handicap rating assigned to a horse.

title: Mare
definition: Female horse aged five or older.

title: Filly
definition: Female horse aged four or younger.

title: Gelding
definition: Male horse that has been castrated.

title: Good to Soft
definition: Ground condition between good and soft.
